p: Compound 266 was tested for antimicrobial activities against two plant-pathogenic fungi Fusarium oxysporum f. sp. momordicae nov. f. and Colletotrichum gloeosporioides, and exhibited potent activity against both strains with MIC values of 5 µM, which was close to that of the positive control, amphotericin B (MIC = 0.5 µM) [ 77].
